FuncDef:
The startup system-software command configures system software for the next AP startup.
By default, no system software is configured for the next AP startup.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a system software file.
The value is a string of 4 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Configures system software for the next startup of all APs.
-

Specifies a start AP ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8191.

Specifies an end AP ID. An end AP ID cannot be less than a start AP ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8192.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure system software for the next AP startup, run the startup system-software command.
Configuration Impact
After the startup system-software command is run, the AP automatically starts the system software specified by system-file after a restart.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
You must restart the AP for the startup system-software command to take effect.
